article_title: Affordable Care Act in Mergers and Acquisitions: New Guidance from Internal Revenue Service

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Kevin Wiggins; Saul Ewing LLP

og.description: In Notice 2014-49 the Internal Revenue Service (“Service”) issued guidance on how to avoid potential penalties under the Affordable Care Act (“ACA”) in connection with mergers and acquisitions (“M&A”). The notice provides a “safe harbor” that M&A Buyers can use to count the hours of Targets’ employees hired by Buyer if Buyer counts hours differently from the way Target counts hours.
